name: c4-plan
description: Discovery → Design → Lighthouse contracts → Task creation. Full structured plan.

name: c4-run
description: Spawn workers for all pending tasks in parallel. Continuous mode.

name: c4-finish
description: Build → test → docs → commit. Post-implementation routine.

name: c4-status
description: Visual task graph with progress, dependency graph, queue summary.

name: c4-quick
description: Create + assign one task immediately, skip planning phase.

name: c4-polish
description: Build-test-review-fix loop until reviewer finds zero changes.

name: c4-refine
description: Iterative review-fix loop using isolated worker context.

name: c4-checkpoint
description: 4-lens phase gate: approve, request-changes, replan, or redesign.

name: c4-validate
description: Run lint + tests. CRITICAL blocks commit, HIGH requires review.

name: c4-review
description: 3-pass review with 6-axis evaluation. Generates formal review document.

name: c4-add-task
description: Add task interactively with DoD and scope guidance.

name: c4-submit
description: Submit completed task with automated validation and commit SHA verify.

name: c4-interview
description: Deep requirements interview. Discovers hidden requirements and edge cases.

name: c4-stop
description: Stop execution, transition to HALTED state. Preserves progress.

name: c4-clear
description: Reset C4 state for debugging. Clears tasks, events, locks.

name: c4-swarm
description: Spawn coordinator-led agent team. Modes: standard, review, investigate.

name: c4-standby
description: Convert session into persistent C5 Hub worker.

name: c2-paper-review
description: Academic paper review via C2. 3-pass, 6-axis evaluation, bilingual output.

name: research-loop
description: Paper-experiment improvement loop. Iterates until target quality reached.

name: c4-init
description: Initialize C4 in current project. Runs cq claude/cursor/codex.

name: c4-release
description: Generate CHANGELOG from git history. Semantic version suggestion.

name: c4-help
description: Quick reference for all skills, agents, and MCP tools.
